suggestions.original: To improve the realism of the artwork, consider adding more detailed textures to the dog's fur and facial features. Enhance the lighting and shading to create a more three-dimensional effect. Pay attention to the background, adding more depth and detail to make it more lifelike. Additionally, refining the proportions and anatomy of the dog can contribute to a more realistic representation.
